description: The MSCI World Low Carbon SRI Selection Index aims to reflect the performance of the following market: Large and mid-cap companies from global developed markets with high ESG characteristics and low carbon exposures, relative to their peers Reviewed on a quarterly basis Additional information on the index, selection and weighting methodology is available at https://www.msci.com
name: Xtrackers MSCI World ESG UCITS ETF 1C
